pages.title: Alignment: Stability
pages.text: <thing>Stability/$ (blue) is one of the basic <thing>alignments/$- the <thing>alignment/$ of a pure <thing>stability/$ beam.$(br2)<thing>Stabiliy/$ blocks all explosions within range while the beam is maintained. The range is the beam <thing>power/$. This includes some wither explosions and explosions from <thing>Chaos/$ beams-
among all others.$(br2)Any explosions within the range will do no damage, destroy nothing, and will be completely stopped.$(br2)
<thing>Void-Stability/$ AKA <thing>Chaos/$ will create explosions with a strength=<thing>power/$/4. These explosions will drop all items, similar to TNT explosions.$(br2)
